description: The initiative is a Dutch nonprofit foundation established in 2020, focused on promoting sustainable development through circular and regenerative innovations in local communities across Africa. It aims to enhance health and well-being by increasing access to nutritious food, sustainable energy, and ecosystem restoration. The foundation trains farmers in syntropic agroforestry techniques, fostering resilient communities while advocating for environmental sustainability and public health, particularly in Kenya and East Africa.
name: Feed Back the Future
